title: Pot Legalization Makes Vaping Deadly
text:
Doctors have linked a tragic wave of lung injuries and deaths to the vaping of tainted marijuana concentrates. The episode reveals the dangers created by the federal government’s decadelong refusal to challenge state laws legalizing pot and promoting risky uses of its derivatives.

The Obama administration announced in 2013 that it wouldn’t enforce federal drug laws in states that had legalized pot use. The following year, Congress started attaching legislative riders to budget bills to prevent the Justice Department and other...
description: Recent injuries and deaths demonstrate the need for Washington to take control over cannabis policy.
